fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items

Class InventoryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items.InventoryUtils

  • public abstract class InventoryUtils
extends Object
    This class provides various utilities for inventory management.

      • getHoldingHand

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable InventoryUtils.DualWielding getHoldingHand(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                             @NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Returns which player's hand is holding the specific item. If dual-wielding is not available, the item is tested against the player's only hand.
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        item - The item
        Returns:
        The hand holding the given item, or null if neither of them is holding it.

      • breakItemInHand

        public static void breakItemInHand(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                   @NotNull
                                   InventoryUtils.DualWielding hand)
        Breaks the item currently in the hand of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        hand - The hand to retrieve the item from. This will always be the main hand if the Bukkit build don't support dual-wielding.

      • breakItemInHand

                                   org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Breaks the given item if it is found in one of the player's hands.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        item - The item to break.
